published_attributes.title: Learning Plan
published_attributes.serialized_body:
Initial Disclaimer: Unless you are legal or fintech professional, dealing with legal stuff is never core of your work. Remember to always point your legal concern to specialist appointed to your project or your PM. This course is meant to help you understand your current responsibilities described by legal act not to gives you new responsibility as lawyer.

Reasoning: Financial market is extremely regulated. It is most likely that during your work with Fintech (despite of your profession) you will knowingly or unconsciously face problems being a subject of legal acts. This course will prepare you for that situation

E-learning outcomes:

Understanding of:

  • which regulatory entity is supervising the Fintech I am working with
  • how to find legal act related to you work with Fintech customer

published_attributes.title: Who is having financial supervision over my client's Fintech
published_attributes.serialized_body:
1. Let start with reviewing the list of every regulatory authorities and supervisory agencies all over the world - click the list!
  2. Find the authority or authorities from your client jurisdiction - In some cases there is more than one supervision authority. For example in Poland we have:
    1. Central Bank - responsible for interbank operations, financial liquidity on market (not related for Fintechs)
    2. Financial Supervision Authority - responsible for supervision over financial institutions creation and implementation of legal framework (definitely related to Fintechs)
    3. Bank Guarantee Fund - responsible for bank resolution (bankruptcy of banks)
    4. Similar roles we can find all over the world, except where we have just central bank that hold all responsibilities
  3. Confirm your findings with Fintech expert assigned to your project, or request PM to arrange that type of a consultation

blocks.text: Let start with reviewing the list of every regulatory authorities and supervisory agencies all over the world - click the list!
Find the authority or authorities from your client jurisdiction - In some cases there is more than one supervision authority. For example in Poland we have:
Central Bank - responsible for interbank operations, financial liquidity on market (not related for Fintechs)
Financial Supervision Authority - responsible for supervision over financial institutions creation and implementation of legal framework (definitely related to Fintechs)
Bank Guarantee Fund - responsible for bank resolution (bankruptcy of banks)
Similar roles we can find all over the world, except where we have just central bank that hold all responsibilities
Confirm your findings with Fintech expert assigned to your project, or request PM to arrange that type of a consultation

published_attributes.title: Where to find legal act related to my work
published_attributes.serialized_body:
• Financial institutions operate under local legal environment and regulations/ best practices issued by supervision authority
  • You don’t have to know specific regulations however it is crucial to know where to find legal acts related to our scope of work on project

Best source of information are Supervision Authority Guidelines. Guidelines describes how to follow regulations on low level flows 

  • Eg. requirements and best practices for authentication we will find Security Guideline (name of guideline could differ)
  • The guidelines can be found on the websites of your client's Financial Supervision Authority

published_attributes.title: Finding legal act best practice
published_attributes.serialized_body:
1. Always check for newer version of the document and do not depend of old most likely outdated stuff
  2. More local and specific financial authority usually overrule regional
    1. country specific financial supervision authority have the last word when it comes to implementation of international policies
    2. Supervision related to your customer industry is probably better source of information that general institution - eg. if your client will be trading securities, try to check Central Securities Depository website before viewing Central Bank website
  3. More Specific document is better that general one but keep in mind that this rule can not overrule the first rule standing that the newer document the better
  4. Share your findings and legal acts with the rest of team. That way you will:
    1. get double check of your findings
    2. assure mutual understandings of rules you need to follow with this customer

blocks.text: Always check for newer version of the document and do not depend of old most likely outdated stuff

country specific financial supervision authority have the last word when it comes to implementation of international policies

Supervision related to your customer industry is probably better source of information that general institution - eg. if your client will be trading securities, try to check Central Securities Depository website before viewing Central Bank website

get double check of your findings
assure mutual understandings of rules you need to follow with this customer

published_attributes.title: Exercise
published_attributes.serialized_body:
Find requirements for Authorisations Process for Electronic Money Institution from Malta

The excise have 3 steps, where you need to determine:

  1. which jurisdiction is the most relevant
  2. which financial authority is more related to your subject
  3. which document (website) is the most relevant

HINT: the exercise can be done without actual reading the documents, the description of documents should be self-explanatory

published_attributes.title: which jurisdiction is the most relevant?

feedback.correct: In European Economic Area detailed guidelines are responsibilities of local Financial Supervision Authority
feedback.incorrect: This institution do not have executive supervisions rights

draft_attributes.title: which jurisdiction is the most relevant?

feedback.correct: In European Economic Area detailed guidelines are responsibilities of local Financial Supervision Authority
feedback.incorrect: This institution do not have executive supervisions rights

published_attributes.title: Which financial authority is more related to your subject?

feedback.correct: Whenever we have central bank it is highly possible to have supervision authority. Nevertheless usually when we have both Central Bank and Financial Services Authority, the second one is responsible for detailed implementations

draft_attributes.title: Which financial authority is more related to your subject?

feedback.correct: Whenever we have central bank it is highly possible to have supervision authority. Nevertheless usually when we have both Central Bank and Financial Services Authority, the second one is responsible for detailed implementations

answers.body: Warnings for private individuals about scammers - https://www.mfsa.mt/consumers/scams-warnings/typical-scams/
Complaints Policy for learning program issued by FSA - https://www.mfsa.mt/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/FSA_Complaints-Policy-and-Procedures_2002.03.pdf
Website with best practice how to safely use digital banking - https://www.mfsa.mt/consumers/consumer-awareness-and-education/banking/digital-banking/

published_attributes.title: Which document (website) is the most relevant?

feedback.incorrect: All documents are related to subject however, the one you chose do not specify authorisations process requirements
